goldenInsights.insight: Semi-automatic mayonnaise fillers typically pay for themselves in 2-4 months, while full automation takes 6-12 months
goldenInsights.suggestedUse: hook - challenges assumption that automation is expensive

goldenInsights.insight: BPM = Fill Heads x Cycles Per Minute - with 8 heads and 15-second cycle = 32 BPM (1,920 bottles/hour)
Using regular liquid filling machines for mayonnaise causes clogs, leaks, and wasted ingredients - a common costly mistake
goldenInsights.suggestedUse: problem setup - why specialized machines matter

goldenInsights.insight: Servo-driven piston fillers achieve +/-0.25% accuracy vs +/-1% for standard systems
